text: Bruce Owen (May 24, 1931February 7, 2022) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He was a Member of Provincial Parliament (MPP) in the Legislative Assembly of Ontario from 1987 to 1990. He was a member of the Liberal Party. Owen was born in Chatham, Ontario, Canada. Owen died of problems caused by a heart attack on February 2, 2022 in Barrie, Ontario at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Bruce Owen
